about.title: Professional Profile
about.description: I am interested in technology not as an end, but as a means to solve real problems. My work moves between engineering, education, and operational execution, always seeking to bridge the gap between theory and effective implementation.
about.philosophy: I prefer systems that work for 10 years over brilliant solutions that fail in production.
mindset: Systemic approach: complete processes, not isolated tasks.
High tolerance for incomplete contexts and pressure.

items.description: Standardization of flows and digitization of traceability for last-mile logistics. Development of BaruLogix for operational control and scalability, managing +75,500 monthly packages with reduced inter-company friction.
Applied consulting to close the AI adoption gap. Design of practical training and prioritization of use cases with rapid ROI, achieving accelerated learning curves and real pilot implementations.

Leadership under pressure in international competitions. Technical mentorship and communication strategy in multicultural environments, demonstrating that managing limited resources is a key technical skill.
Lead mentor in creating one of the first FTC teams in Colombia. Leadership in mechanical design, manufacturing, and construction strategy under international standards.
Creation of real operational interfaces. Development of platforms like BaruLogix and Eduqualityco, integrating operational needs with robust technological solutions.
Responsible for chassis design, mechanisms, and technical documentation according to FRC regulations. Technical support in design and construction.
Participation in the 'Pacífico en su Salsa' project. Optimization and structuring of educational content in digital environments, bridging technology and cultural management.
Academic and social support for first-semester students, aiding their integration and development of transversal skills.
Evaluation of performance, rule compliance, robot design, and FIRST values in official regional competitions.
Comprehensive technical support in the design and development of functional prototypes with Arduino and applied electronics for solving real-world problems.

contact.title: Contact
